title: tokyohd
author: tokyohd
content: The Shiba Inu team has announced a major partnership with The Third Floor (TTF), the busiest visualization company known for working on dozens of Marvel blockbusters. TTF will help the developers behind the popular meme coin to define virtual environments for the metaverse project, taking control of artistic development.            The American company has worked on such projects as “Avengers: Infinity War,” “Wonder Woman,” “Thor: Ragnarok,” “Mad Max: Fury Road,” and other prominent movies. TTF has also worked on video games, including “Doom” and “Residential Evil 6” as well as episodic shows. Dane Smith, chief creative officer at TTF, said that the artistic-driven vision shared by the Shiba Inu community was “inspiring.” Smith believes that the metaverse can potentially offer an infinite number of possibilities and mixed-reality experiences.Read more on U.Today https://u.today/shiba-inu-partners-with-longtime-marvel-collaborators

comments.author: Grim149x
comments.body: Wow thats amazing thats why iam still holding my shib inu. Ibelieve in the future of shib and soon theres more have a plan for shib inu future and the stable usd for shib is comming.

comments.author: JangoUnchained
comments.body: Honestly Shiba inu don't have to be 1$ to be a really profitable project in a few years more, this project is growing bigger and bigger, all I need is two zeros down, right now its value is 0.000011$, a 100$ investment on shiba inu today will give you 10,000$ if shib kills two zeros in future, also the burning rate of shiba is big.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Quote from: JangoUnchained on July 21, 2022, 02:41:40 PMHonestly Shiba inu don't have to be 1$ to be a really profitable project in a few years more, this project is growing bigger and bigger, all I need is two zeros down, right now its value is 0.000011$, a 100$ investment on shiba inu today will give you 10,000$ if shib kills two zeros in future, also the burning rate of shiba is big.Which is why a tiny investment allocation for Shib will already be good for an investor incase the hype again will burst its pump. With just a slight increase while you have billions of SHIB, you can already make thousands of money. Its a numbers game really that with just a slight jump of price it amplifies your investment a hundred times already.  Partnership like this may not show spikes of price  yet but maybe when there is a metaverse update for it.

comments.author: dlightag
comments.body: That is a good one, Shiba Inu price really surprise me, just a short period of time Shiba Inu cancelled a lot of zero during the bull run, nevertheless any thing can happen in cryptocurrency and Shiba Inu really has a future prospect base the update that is coming up and also the burning mechanism in the near future, shiba Inu may reach 10 cents and above.

comments.author: Anonylz
comments.body: As interesting as this news sound, never thought anything useful will come out of an ordinary memecoin like shiba inu, I must say the dev are trying to let no stone unturned in their quest to create a strong utility for this very popular memecoin. I like metaverse and want to invest in any of the top metaverse projects in the ecosystem for long-term goal but am not sure about shiba inu as a long-term thing (I might be wrong), just my opinion.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: Good news if they will really collab and there's something that they gonna build soon. I know how it goes with this investment. I don't like to hold it and I don't want to put much money into this. The news sort of brought some uplifting to the investors but that won't define the entire outcome of shiba in the near future because it has to be applied to see how it will go. Quote from: JangoUnchained on July 21, 2022, 02:41:40 PMHonestly Shiba inu don't have to be 1$ to be a really profitable project in a few years more, this project is growing bigger and bigger, all I need is two zeros down, right now its value is 0.000011$, a 100$ investment on shiba inu today will give you 10,000$ if shib kills two zeros in future, also the burning rate of shiba is big.I understand this numbers game and it's really intriguing and interesting if you're reading from the perspective of an investor and at the same time as a believer in this project. I might rethink my thoughts about shiba.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: So the partnership is about the metaverse that Shiba Inu is building, am I right? Well, that's kinda huge and we know how huge their community too, that's what drives Shiba Inu to what he is right now. Not putting that much of an attention but it's good if both of them benefit on each other with this but first we need application from their sides on how this partnership flourish, until then I say it's still unclear.

comments.author: Vaskiy
comments.body: It looks like Shiba is into the process of giving real-time usage access. As a part, earlier it had the development of ShibaSwap. Now it had taken the next step through the partnering. The focus is over the development of the metaverse project in which the community members were able to mint land plots on the virtual space. Hope this takes the Shiba to a bigger bounce.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: This is an interesting piece of news.  It looks like Shiba is going out of its sandbox of just being a meme token.  It is good to see Shba's process of real-life usage by partnering with a different companies to further expand its market influence.  I wonder how well the market react to this news of the partnership.

comments.author: btc_angela
comments.body: As per the article:QuoteTTF will help the developers behind the popular meme coin to define virtual environments for the metaverse project, taking control of artistic development.     I really don't understand what virtual environments should be design, I guess the environment will be different and it will be one of a kind for Metaverse project since TTF will be entering the picture. And since this is their expertise, it might elevate it to new heights?Anyhow, let's see how it goes and let the Metaverse bandwagon continue, and hopefully this collaboration will be a success.
